title: Esports: Return of the Team Icons

replies.body: I don't think anyone would buy a bundle full of icons...
well I spent almost 100 dollars on lol and I wont buy dat bunddle
$100? **You gotta get those numbers up! Those are rookie numbers!**
Just last week I bought a $100 LoL gift card. Wasn't the first time... lol
I understood that reference.
I've spent nearly 1000 and I'm still a minor ;~;
Most of us are sitting around 1-3k spent on league lmao
just that?
only 3k? thats still rookie numbers
But when your an icon collector like me... JK I'm poor now :<

True, you could have only 1 icon at a time,
well done riot{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

To be fair, you can also only have one skin at a time.  The bigger issue is if you're buying an eSports icon, it's typically cause you're a fan of a specific team.  Would be odd to just buy all icons for a region since you're likely not a fan of all those teams.
The ocean probably got a little saltier thanks to the tears of Team Salty Mid fans
are these new or are they just the 2017 ones?
Most of them are the same from Spring Split 2017! Some were updated, some were removed (relegated teams), some were added (promoted teams).
Why are there icons for Vietnam but not the rest of the countries within the SEA region (Thailand, Indonesia, etc.)?
I have spent.. OVER 9,000!!!
Logged in to upvote you
Logged in to downvote you
logged in to downvote you{{summoner:14}}
i've spent 5 million dollars in the game and have every single skin in the game with boatloads of RP left over and i wouldn't buy a bundle of icons
New icon for delta fox?
is there any way to get the icon without having to buy the bundle?

"buys icon for chinese team"
LOL YOU STUPID ASIAN FUCK GO PLAY DOTA
personal experience.
When will we get the Delta Fox icon {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
And here I just want a FNC icon that doesn't have an ugly year ruining it... and I get just that but for TSM for no reason
hey Riot, can you re enable last years recalls and emotes?

M19 is Albus Nox Luna everyone! aMiracle left after worlds, then they got picked up by M19, then Smurf and PvPstejos left. but its still Albus Nox in my book. support M19 :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Bought the tainted minds icon but then it was remade. Now it looks worse than it was {{item:3070}}
Yay Talumar!!!! {{summoner:4}}
Personally i think Icons and Ward Skins should be way cheaper.  not all of us can get that league of {{champion:119}} money :'(
i got my CLG icon to max last season and now i can't show my clg icon after good plays. Please return that ability
I would love to buy previous esports icons, especially 2014-2015!{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Should of got your LMQ Icon back when a full five man chinese roster in NA could happen!
grizzled league veteran here having spent more than $800 on this game still wouldn't buy a bundle of summoner icons. or any summoner icons for that matter
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I personally think dat nobody would buy icon bundles at those prices
GOOD NIGHT TALUMAR
It would be nice that if we get GPL icons, even though the lack of popularity, at least the 6 icons competing for GPL summer
